Name: Scorpocalypse
Title: Eremite Scorching Loremaster: Scorpocalypse
Source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge against the Eremite Scorching Loremaster at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives in a Friendly Fracas

Talent.Name: Scorpocalypse
Talent.Desc:
$[K1]: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A2303]</color>, equip this card.
After $[A2303] equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>$[S23032]</color> once.
When your $[A2303], who has this card equipped, is on the field and after you use <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[S1230311]</color> to defeat an opposing character: Add 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C123031]</color> card to your Hand.
At the end of the Round: Generate 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C123032]</color> stack.
(You must have $[A2303] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

K1.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>
K1.Desc: After you finish 1 Combat Action, it will be your opponent's turn.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Playing a card from your Hand with this rule is also a Combat Action rather than a Fast Action</color>.

C123031.Name: Spirit of Omen: Pyro Scorpion
C123031.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFFFF>When the character to which this is attached takes DMG:</color> If possible, lose 1 Energy to negate 1 DMG, and then create a <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C123032]</color>. (Max Twice per Round).
$[K58]: $[S1230311]
<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 1</color>
(A character can only equip 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3008}Technique at a time)

C123032.Name: Scorpion Blessing
C123032.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When your $[C123031] uses $[K58]:</color> Remove this effect, and for each stack of <color=#FFFFFFFF>Scorpion Blessing</color>, the DMG dealt by this instance of $[K58] +1.\n(<color=#FFFFFFFF>Scorpion Blessing</color>can stack, no limit)

K58.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#3008}Technique</color>
K58.Desc: When the active character is equipped with a {SPRITE_PRESET#3008}Technique card, they can use the corresponding {SPRITE_PRESET#3008}Technique.\nUsing a {SPRITE_PRESET#3008} Technique counts as a Combat Action. If the character is unable to use Skills due to conditions like Frozen, Petrification, or Stun, they are also unable to use the {SPRITE_PRESET#3008}Technique.\nUsing a {SPRITE_PRESET#3008}Technique is not considered as using a Skill. Therefore, it cannot trigger effects such as "After using a skill" or "After the character triggers an Elemental Reaction." Damage dealt by using a {SPRITE_PRESET#3008}Technique is not considered Damage dealt by the character.

K3.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>
K3.Desc: After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages</color> remaining.
